statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customer_profiles WHERE voice_recognition_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, preferred_language FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY preferred_language DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_profiles WHERE voice_recognition_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone FROM customer_profiles WHERE preferred_language = 'English';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE language='English';
SELECT customer_id, language, voice_type FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE first_name = 'Alice';
SELECT first_name, email, language FROM customer_profiles JOIN customer_preferences ON customer_profiles.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, preference_id, language FROM customer_profiles LEFT JOIN customer_preferences ON customer_profiles.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT name, email FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, theme_preference FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupportInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'complaint';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_duration FROM SupportInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT cp.name, cp.email, ci.interaction_date FROM CustomerProfiles cp INNER JOIN SupportInteractions ci ON cp.customer_id = ci.customer_id WHERE ci.interaction_type = 'Email';

SELECT cp.name, cp.email, cp.phone_number, cpf.language_preference FROM CustomerProfiles cp INNER JOIN CustomerPreferences cpf ON cp.customer_id = cpf.customer_id WHERE cpf.language_preference = 'English';
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles ORDER BY name DESC, customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM SupportInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT voice_input, recognized_command FROM VoiceRecognition WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE notification_enabled = TRUE ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT cp.*, si.interaction_date FROM CustomerProfiles cp JOIN SupportInteractions si ON cp.customer_id = si.customer_id WHERE cp.last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY si.interaction_date ASC;

SELECT cr.voice_input, cr.recognized_command, cr.confidence_level FROM VoiceRecognition cr JOIN SupportInteractions si ON cr.interaction_id = si.interaction_id WHERE si.interaction_type = 'Chat' ORDER BY cr.confidence_level DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT cp.first_name, cp.last_name, cp.email, cr.voice_input AS command FROM CustomerProfiles cp JOIN VoiceRecognition cr ON cp.customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM SupportInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call' LIMIT 1) WHERE cp.customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM support_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT agent_id, first_name, last_name, agent_type FROM support_agents WHERE language_skill = 'English';
SELECT customer_id, language_preference, voice_type_preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 101
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT cp.first_name, cp.last_name, cp.email, ci.interaction_type FROM customer_profiles cp JOIN support_interactions ci ON cp.customer_id = ci.customer_id
SELECT sa.first_name, sa.last_name, sa.agent_type, ci.interaction_date FROM support_agents sa JOIN support_interactions ci ON sa.agent_id = ci.customer_id

SELECT ci.interaction_id, cp.first_name AS customer_first_name, sa.first_name AS agent_first_name, sa.agent_type FROM support_interactions ci JOIN customer_profiles cp ON ci.customer_id = cp.customer_id JOIN support_agents sa ON ci.agent_id = sa.agent_id
